full_output.summary: Enthusiastic and dedicated Computer Science Engineering student specializing in Big Data Analytics. Proficient in Python and C++, with a solid understanding of data structures and algorithms. Experienced in software development methodologies and collaborative problem-solving. Demonstrates strong problem- solving abilities with a logical and analytical approach. Skilled at applying design thinking principles to create user-centric solutions. Passionate about emerging technologies, particularly machine learning. Committed to continuous learning and contributing to innovative projects in computer science and big data analytics.

education.school: Andhra Pradesh Board of Intermediate Education
Board of Secondary Education Of Andhra Pradesh

projects.name: Movie Recommendation System
projects.description: The Movie Recommendations project utilizes a hybrid approach combining collaborative filtering and content-based filtering techniques. User data is pre-processed and analyzed using Python and Pandas,with machine learning algorithms applied via libraries like Scikit-learn. The system integrates data from multiple APIs, processes it in real-time, and leverages TensorFlow for model training, ensuring personalized and accurate movie suggestions for each user.

projects.name: Climate Monitoring and Analysis System
projects.description: Developed a secure web platform for comprehensive climate data analysis, featuring user authentication, role-based access control, and dynamic visualizations. Leveraged Python's built-in libraries to implement efficient data storage and construct a robust backend, facilitating seamless data management, trend analysis, and forecasting to support climate research and informed policy-making.

full_output.name: Meghana Vadde
